targets.expr:
100 - (
  avg_over_time(node_filesystem_avail_bytes{job="node-exporter", instance="10.0.2.20:9100", mountpoint="/", fstype!="rootfs"}[$__rate_interval]) * 100
  /
  avg_over_time(node_filesystem_size_bytes{job="node-exporter", instance="10.0.2.20:9100", mountpoint="/", fstype!="rootfs"}[$__rate_interval])
)
